grove.GroveJoystick.joyread: Detect position from Grove - Thumb Joystick
grove.PAJ7620.init: Create a new driver of Grove - Gesture
grove.PAJ7620.read: Detect and recognize the gestures from Grove - Gesture
grove.TM1637.bit: Show a single number from 0 to 9 at a specified digit of Grove - 4-Digit Display
grove.TM1637.point: Turn on or off the colon point on Grove - 4-Digit Display
grove.TM1637.set: Set the brightness level of display at from 0 to 7
grove.TM1637.show: Show a 4 digits number on display
grove.createDisplay: Create a new driver Grove - 4-Digit Display
grove.ggesture:
Converts the gesture name to a number
Useful for comparisons
grove.isCodal: Check if the runtime is Codal
grove.joystickkey:
Converts the key name to a number
Useful for comparisons
grove.measureDistance: Create a new driver of Grove - Ultrasonic Sensor to measure distances in cm
grove.measureDistance|param|pin: signal pin of ultrasonic ranger module
grove.measureDistance|param|unit: Distance unit of the measurement, cm or inch
grove.measureInCentimeters: Create a new driver of Grove - Ultrasonic Sensor to measure distances in cm
grove.measureInCentimeters|param|pin: signal pin of ultrasonic ranger module
grove.measureInInches: Create a new driver Grove - Ultrasonic Sensor to measure distances in inch
grove.measureInInches|param|pin: signal pin of ultrasonic ranger module
grove.onGesture: Do something when a gesture is detected by Grove - Gesture
grove.onJoystick: Do something when a key is detected by Grove - Thumb Joystick
grove.setupWifi: Setup Grove - Uart WiFi V2 to connect to  Wi-Fi
grove.wifiOK: Check if Grove - Uart WiFi V2 is connected to Wifi
